raw akas.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan

akas: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (original title)
akas from release info: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (original title)

1.title: Hitler's British Headquarters

episode of.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: What world could we now inhabit had the Nazis prevailed in WWII? Hear about Hitler's post-war plans for Britain, from concentration camps on UK soil to new national landmarks.

2.title: Megacities

episode of.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: From rebranding Berlin as the world's capital to the destruction of Warsaw, hear about Adolf Hitler's plans to redesign Germany's occupied territories after WWII.

3.title: America

episode of.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (TV Series 2018)

3.plot: Adolf Hitler's aspirations were truly global. Hear about the Nazis' plans to invade America - and the surprising support for National Socialism in the 'land of the free'.

4.title: Nazification

episode of.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (TV Series 2018)

4.plot: Discover how Adolf Hitler intended to shape model Nazi citizens through anti-Semitic clothing laws, the establishing of SS bride schools and breeding programmes.

5.title: Recreation For The Reich

episode of.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (TV Series 2018)

5.plot: Hear how Adolf Hitler used recreation and leisure time to control Germany's workforce and indoctrinate citizens of the Third Reich with the ideals of the Nazi regime.

6.title: Transporting The Reich

episode of.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan (TV Series 2018)

6.plot: Hear about Adolf Hitler's grand plans to modernise the German transport system, including super trains, futuristic airports and planes for the public.

imdb.plot outline: It's probably the greatest historical "what if?" of all time. A question that fascinates and horrifies in equal measures: what if Nazi Germany had won the Second World War? In this brand-new and exclusive six-part series, author and historian Guy Walters reveals how Hitler had already started to implement plans of world domination long before the war had started and explores how the Fuhrer intended to carry them out, regardless of the human cost.
imdb.title: Nazi Victory: The Post War Plan
plot: It's probably the greatest historical "what if?" of all time. A question that fascinates and horrifies in equal measures: what if Nazi Germany had won the Second World War? In this brand-new and exclusive six-part series, author and historian Guy Walters reveals how Hitler had already started to implement plans of world domination long before the war had started and explores how the Fuhrer intended to carry them out, regardless of the human cost.::Trevor
